Change Log:
==========

+~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~+
|Note: Download the latest version only! (v-0.8.0) bugs free and fast calculation|

-----------------------
- First Release

-----------------------
- Second Release

version-0.3 (5:24 PM 6/2/2022)
-----------------------
- Third Release

-----------------------
- version-0.4 couldn't be uploaded because of bugs

version-0.5 (8:34 PM 6/3/2022)
-----------------------
- Fifth Release (all the bugs has been resolved)

-----------------------
- Sixth Release

NOTE (2:21 AM 6/6/2022)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ version-0.7 (Work in progress...) ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

version-0.7 (7:05 PM 6/9/2022)
-----------------------
- Seventh Release
    New Feature is added called Statistics to deal with different datasets.

version-0.7.1 (10:19 PM 6/9/2022)
-----------------------
- Eighth Release
    Bug Fixes

version-0.7.2 (8:02 PM 6/13/2022)
-----------------------
- Ninth Release
    Minor Changes: Improvements in some functions to make more reliable and fast computing.

version-0.7.3 (12:38 AM 6/15/2022)
-----------------------
- Tenth Release
    Minor Changes: Round of figure MSE (Mean Squared Error) function were added

version-0.7.4 (9:36 PM 6/16/2022)
-----------------------
- Eleventh release
    Major Changes: Bug fixed in Quartiles function

version-0.7.5 (6:17 PM 6/18/2022)
-----------------------
- Twelfth release
    New Feature: Inter Quartiles Range(IQR) and Outliers

version-0.7.6 (2:53 PM 6/20/2022)
-----------------------
- Twelfth release
    Major Changes: Calculation error in Quartiles has been fixed!
    Note: I recommend to Download latest version of chemaphy package...

version-0.8.0 (12:02 AM 6/23/2022)
-----------------------
- Twelfth release
    Major Changes: Calculation error in Quartiles has been fixed!
    Note: I recommend to Download latest version of chemaphy package...
